rpo.lavidacraft.blocks.glowstone.tooltip: Custom textures for glowstone and glowstone dust
rpo.lavidacraft.blocks.grasslikeSides.to: Custom textures for mycelium and podzol sides
rpo.lavidacraft.blocks.ores.tooltip: Custom textures for coal, copper, diamond, gold, iron, and lapis ores
rpo.lavidacraft.blocks.redstone.tooltip: Custom textures for deepslate redstone ore, redstone ore, and redstone torches
rpo.lavidacraft.blocks.seagrass.tooltip: Fixes tall seagrass clipping through the top of water
rpo.lavidacraft.blocks.torch.tooltip: Custom model and texture for torches and soul torches
rpo.lavidacraft.entities.arrows.tooltip: Matches the color palette of shot arrows to the item
rpo.lavidacraft.entities.guardianBeams.t: Custom texture for the beams guardians shoot
rpo.lavidacraft.gui.bars.tooltip: Custom textures for the experience bar and the jump bar
rpo.lavidacraft.gui.equipmentSlots.toolt: Custom textures for armor slots and the off-hand slot
rpo.lavidacraft.gui.hotbar.tooltip: Custom texture for the hotbar and hotbar selector
rpo.lavidacraft.gui.icons.tooltip: Custom textures for hearts, armor, and the hunger bar
rpo.lavidacraft.items.books.tooltip: Custom textures for books, enchanted books, the recipe book, and writable books
rpo.lavidacraft.items.bottles.tooltip: Custom textures for bottles, honey bottles, experience bottles, and dragon breath
rpo.lavidacraft.items.netheriteTools.too: Custom textures for netherite axes, hoes, pickaxes, shovels, and swords
rpo.lavidacraft.items.netheriteToolsEmis: Emissive textures for netherite tools (Requires OptiFine or similar mod)
rpo.lavidacraft.items.nuggets.tooltip: Custom textures for gold and iron nuggets that make them look like coins
rpo.lavidacraft.items.potions.tooltip: Custom textures for potions, lingering potions, and splash potions. This also affects brewing stands and their UI
rpo.lavidacraft.misc.diamondArmor.toolti: Fixes pixels that are missing from diamond armor when comparing it to other armor sets
rpo.lavidacraft.misc.leatherArmor.toolti: Allows the entire leather armor texture to be affected by dye
rpo.lavidacraft.misc.netheriteArmor.tool: Altered color palette for netherite armor
